verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
ALL HEAVEN DECLARES,
The glory of the risen Lord.
Who can compare
With the beauty of the Lord?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Forever He will be (forever)
The Lamb upon the throne (on the throne)
I gladly bow the knee (we bow)
And worship Him alone (alone).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will proclaim,
The glory of the risen Lord.
Who once was slain
To reconcile man to God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Forever You will be (forever)
The Lamb upon the throne (on the throne).
I gladly bow the knee (we bow)
And worship You alone (alone).
